title: Dashboard UI
notes: React 19 + Vite 6 + Tailwind v4 + shadcn/ui SPA. OTP login, app shell (sidebar + mobile nav), alert banner. 4 pages: Schedule (booking table, create/detail, status transitions), Fleet (card grid, detail sheet, maintenance timeline), Financials (summary cards, receivables, record payment), Team (role management). Error states with retry, empty states, toasts, cross-mutation query invalidation. All 184 monorepo tests passing. PR #6.
